title: Digital Operations: ATMs & Apps

sections.title: Digital Deposits & Withdrawals
sections.content:
Modern banking is digital. You can use an ATM or a mobile app for basic tasks.

- **Digital Deposit**: Putting money into your account using an ATM or scanning a check with your phone.
- **Cardless Withdrawal**: Taking cash out using a QR code from your app.
- **Balance Check**: Seeing your total money on a screen instantly.
- **Transaction History**: A list of your recent spending.

sections.title: ATM Interaction Flow
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[Start] --> B[Insert Card / Scan QR]
    B --> C[Enter PIN]
    C --> D{Select Action}
    D --> E[Withdraw Cash]
    D --> F[Deposit Money]
    D --> G[Check Balance]
    E --> H[Take Cash & Receipt]
    F --> I[Insert Cash/Check]
    G --> J[View on Screen]
```

sections.title: Grammar: Machine Instructions
sections.content:
Machines use **Imperatives** to give you clear steps. 

- **Insert** your card into the slot.
- **Enter** your 4-digit PIN.
- **Select** the amount you want.
- **Confirm** the transaction.
- **Remove** your card and cash.

**Safety Tips:**
- **Do not** share your PIN.
- **Don't** leave your card in the machine.

sections.title: UI Buttons Vocabulary
sections.content:
On an ATM or App, look for these words:
- **Confirm / OK**: Yes, I want this.
- **Cancel / Stop**: No, stop the process.
- **Correction / Clear**: I made a mistake, let me fix it.
- **Print**: I want a paper receipt.

objectives: Understand the flow of using an ATM or digital kiosk
Use imperative verbs to follow and give machine instructions
Identify key UI buttons for digital transactions
